snippet: The stand by conservatives that led to the current crisis was the outgrowth of a long-running effort, waged by a galaxy of well-funded groups, to undo President Obama’s health care law.
abstract: Stand by conservatives that has led to government shutdown was outgrowth of long-running effort, waged by a galaxy of well-funded Republican groups, to undo Pres Obama's health care law; although the law's opponents say that shutting down the government was not their objective, activists anticipated that a shutdown could be the result of scorched-earth legislative strategy.

byline.original: By SHERYL GAY STOLBERG and MIKE McINTIRE

lead_paragraph: The stand by conservatives that led to the current crisis was the outgrowth of a long-running effort, waged by a galaxy of well-funded groups, to undo President Obama’s health care law.

headline.main: A Federal Budget Crisis Months in the Planning
headline.print_headline: A Crisis Months in the Planning

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
